events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but received the wrong size, and I would like to return it for a refund.
The issue has been classified as a refund request due to incorrect product sizing delivered.
Your case has been assigned to our customer support agent, Sarah, who will assist you further.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the wrong jacket size. I'll help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket is still in its original packaging?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and still in the original packaging with tags attached.
Thank you. We will send you a prepaid return shipping label via email. Once we receive the jacket, a full refund will be processed to your original payment method.
Great, thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and prompt refund process.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. You should see the amount reflected on your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to make sure your refund was credited successfully and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
As we have not heard further concerns, we are closing this case. Please contact us anytime if you need additional assistance.
We value your feedback. Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey sent to your email.
